Title: The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet
Writer: Jean-Pierre Jeunet (screenplay), Guillaume Laurant (screenplay), Guillaume Laurant (dialogue), Reif Larsen (novel)
Actors: Helena Bonham Carter, Judy Davis, Callum Keith Rennie, Kyle Catlett
Plot: A ten-year-old scientist secretly leaves his family's ranch in Montana where he lives with his cowboy father and scientist mother, escapes home, and travels across the country aboard a freight train to receive an award at the Smithsonian Institute.
